content: SI SP-M/H Sintered Diamond Wire (Concrete) Premium diamond wire designed for balanced speed and lifetime in all types of concrete and cast iron (15-30 kW wire saw) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond wires, floor saw blades, and wall saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Premium diamond wire â€“ built to deliver a balance of long lifespan and high cutting speed Engineered to handle demanding demolition, construction and refurbishing work Performs best on medium- to high-power wire saws Hilti sintered wires have at least 40 beads per meter for highest possible wire lifetime Applications Cutting all types of concrete from low to highly abrasive Cutting reinforced concrete Complex projects and demanding cutting applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) Segment type: Sintered Wet or dry operation: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Base material | Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) | Segment type | Sintered | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Bead diameter | 0.4 in | Number of beads per meter | 40 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2293606 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-50 SI SP-M/H - Package Size 1 pc - 2299891 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-25m SI SP-M/H - Package Size 25 m - 2299890 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-50m SI SP-M/H - Package Size 50 m - 2299889 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-100m SI SP-M/H - Package Size 100 m
